summary: REQ-21 and REQ-22 appear implemented: AdminLayout switches the Logout button to a disabled loading state with spinner + English text "Logging out..." and prevents repeat requests while pending; useAdminSession now exposes a dedicated `isLogoutPending` flag driven by the logout mutation pending state and continues clearing the session token on successful logout.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/summary files (non-runtime) not explicitly requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for a logout loading indicator and a logout pending flag; changes to project tracking/docs are not part of the requirements.
